item.title: BraA.ELF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA10g032100.3C Gene Symbol: BraA.ELF6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: To investigate the role of BraA.

item.title: BraRGL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02g017510.3.5C Gene Symbol: BraRGL1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: Role of BraRGL1 in regulation of Brassica rapa bolting and flowering.

item.title: BrCCA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra004503 Gene Symbol: BrCCA1 Gene Name: CIRCADIAN AND CLOCK ASSOCIATED 1 Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: Vernalization-mediated demethylation of BrCKA2 (casein kinase II α-subunit) and BrCKB4 (casein kinase II β-subunit) shorten the period of the clock gene BrCCA1 (circadian clock associated 1) in Brassica rapa.

item.title: BrFLC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra028599 Gene Symbol: BrFLC2|BraA.FLC.b Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS C2 Genome: Species: Brassica rapa Functional Descriptions: A naturally occurring InDel variation in BrFLC2|BraA.

item.title: BvFL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BvFL1 Gene Name: FLC-like 1 Genome: Species: Beta vulgaris Functional Descriptions: EcoTILLING in Beta vulgaris reveals polymorphisms in the FLC-like gene BvFL1that are associated with annuality and winter hardiness.

item.title: CaFFN
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA02g14540 Gene Symbol: CaFFN Gene Name: APETALA2 (AP2) homolog Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The APETALA2 homolog CaFFN regulates flowering time in pepper.

item.title: CaJOINTLESS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaJOINTLESS Gene Name: Cajointless Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaJOINTLESS is a MADS-box gene involved in suppression of vegetative growth in all shoot meristems in pepper.

item.title: CKI;EL1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g57940 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0793500 Gene Symbol: CKI EL1 Hd16 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CmCIB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCIB1 Gene Name: CRYPTOCHROME-INTERACTING bHLH1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The GA-receptor CmGID1B plays an important role in integrating photoperiod information from the CmCIB1-PHR2 complex and plant age from the cmo-miR156-CmSPL3 module to coordinate endogenous GA levels and signal perception.

item.title: CmERF110
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: SRP070731 Gene Symbol: CmERF110 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmFLK
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmFLK Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS KH DOMAIN Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CmFTL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmFTL2 Gene Name: flowering locus T-like 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmFTL2 is involved in the photoperiod- and sucrose-mediated control of flowering time in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmMAF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster-17868.118397 Gene Symbol: CmMAF2 Gene Name: AFFECTING FLOWERING 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum MAF2 regulates flowering by repressing gibberellin biosynthesis in response to low temperature.

item.title: CmMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmMYB2 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Regulation of flowering time in chrysanthemum by the R2R3 MYB transcription factor CmMYB2 is associated with changes in gibberellin metabolism.

item.title: CmNRRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmNRRa Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmNRRa, an orthologous gene of OsNRRa that regulates root growth in response to nutrient stress in rice, was identified from Chrysanthemum and its role in flowering time was studied.

item.title: CmPHR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmPHR2 Gene Name: PHOTOLYASE/BLUE LIGHT RECEPTOR2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmCIB1 or CmPHR2 regulates the transition time from the juvenile phase to the adult phase in chrysanthemum.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G073900 Gene Symbol: PRR3b Tof12 Gene Name: Time of Flowering 12 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: PRR3b photoperiodic flowering time regulation Tof11 and Tof12 encode PSEUDO-RESPONSE-REGULATOR-proteins Tof12 and Tof11, to ancient flowering time adaptation, and demonstrate that they act via LHY homologs to promote expression of the legume-specific E1 gene and delay flowering under long photoperiods.
